title: Pole To Win International Continues to Build Its Team with the Addition of Jeff Shelmire as Director, US Sales
text:
Pole To Win fills a key position on their New Markets sales division.
Santa Clara, CA, USA
Pole To Win International, the global business solutions provider for customer support, testing, quality engineering and automation, localization, and onsite services, continues to strengthen its sales team with the addition of a new role: Director of US Sales.
Pole To Win International is pleased to announce that Jeff Shelmire has joined to fill this role. Jeff and his team are responsible for new client acquisition, account and relationship management, coordination of operations and delivery resources for Pole To Win’s non-gaming sales division.
"I am honored to be leading the New Markets sales division at Pole To Win," says Jeff. "We are taking the company's 20 years of successful business dealings within the games market and extending the company's industry-leading services to enterprise businesses. With over 4000 team members and 23 office locations around the globe, Pole To Win can bring the right service, in the right place at the right price. It is a unique market position. Not many organizations have the global infrastructure Pole To Win can leverage."
Jeff comes to Pole To Win from Vee Technologies where he was the Vice President of Sales.Jeff was instrumental in growing that company from 300 employees to well over 2000 employees earning Vee Technologies a place in Inc. Magazine as one the 500 Fastest Growing Companies.Having conducted business in over 11 countries, he has over 22 years of international management experience in sales and marketing positions, including Director of Business Development at Convergys Corporation and Sr. Market Manager at Fujitsu. His experience ranges from large multinational enterprises to start-up companies. Throughout his career, he has built a reputation for implementing successful sales and marketing strategies that have netted millions of dollars for some of the world’s most successful BPO and technology companies.
"I am delighted to have Jeff join our Sales team," says Becky Walker, Pole To Win's Senior Vice President, Sales and Marketing. "His extensive knowledge of working in the BPO sector adds a new dimension to our team and will be invaluable as we continue to move our business into new markets."
About PTW
PTW is the world's premier video game and e-commerce services provider with 4000+ team members across 23 studios worldwide. Our range of services includes: quality engineering, localization, testing, customer support along with voice production, performance capture services, and script writing services. PTW is a one-stop shop for your production needs. We offer two decades of experience and a global reach stretching across 23 studios. Our company has the infrastructure to support projects and companies of all sizes.
PTW International Group is a group of subsidiaries of Poletowin Pitcrew Holdings Inc. POLE TO WIN is a registered trademark of Pole To Win Co., Ltd in Japan and other countries. All rights reserved.
